item.title: API : DELETE /admin-api/search-aliases/{search}
item.description: API : DELETE /admin-api/search-aliases/{search} Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-12293 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/09_searchAlias/01_deleteSearchAliasesSearch.ts Steps Step Description Expected result In BO, Go to Advanced Parameters > Authorization Server Authorization Server Page is displayed correctly. No records found in the table Click on the button “Add new API access” New API access Page is displayed correctly * Fill the form with following data
